Test Your Program
-----------------

To test our subject extraction, we'll filter the following text
file.  Copy it out of your browser and save it as ``jayne.txt``::

   To: George Shmidlap
   From: Rita Marlowe
   Subject: Will Success Spoil Rock Hunter?
   ---
   See subject.
